item.title: Scalability 03 | Scale Vertically (Vertical Scaling)
item.description: Once your application (website) reaches the limits of your server, you should decide how to scale. In this post, we will focus on Vertical Scaling only.

item.title: Scalability 02 | Start Small (Single-Server Configuration)
item.description: In this post, we will take a step back, and discuss how could we start small and simple with our website before considering any scalability options, and we will discuss when should we start considering them

item.title: Scalability 01 | What Is Scalability (Scalability in a Nutshell)?
item.description: Scalability usually means the ability to handle more users, clients, data transactions, or requests without affecting the user experience.
